comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Hmmm, not much to go with here. Age-wise, this might be a fit: Edgar Erastus Clark (February 18, 1856 – December 1, 1930) was an American attorney, government official, and union official, who served on the Interstate Commerce Commission from 1906 to 1921, and was its chairman during 1913–1914 and 1918–1921. No picture in the Wikipedia article. For comparison, there are two in the LOC P&P Harris & Ewing collection (not yet on Flickr): www.loc.gov/pictures/item/hec2008002683/ www.loc.gov/pictures/item/hec2008003531/ I'm inclined to say that this is a match.

comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content:

comment.author: 111167756@N06
comment._content: I have Edgar Erastus Clark original obituary. This is a confirmed match. This is my husbands 3rd great grandfather.

comment._content: This picture is Edgar Erastus Clark. I have his original obituary with picture. He is my husbands 3rd great grandfather.
